data.message: Y the fuck am i listtening to your political bs and not real rap. DAMN, talk about crap. Im turning this off b4 i started disliking you.

replies.message: Snowflake

Em has literally written dozens of songs about how much he hates republicans over the past several decades. 

Telling people to keep politics out of music is retarded. Stop being such a fucking idiot.
Lmfao. Em been having Trumpmares!
TeeJay Small True but its so wrong to get fans hope to hearing a real rap just so he can call Trump on. Not cool.
Candy Huff Campbell, I wasted an hour of my life that I can't get back waiting to hear something new....huge disappointment!!
You do know real rap, is political right
It wasn’t good ....IT WAS GREAT #REALFAN😝😝
I love Em, just didnt enjoy him tonight. realfan hAHAHA. Real fans arent afraid to disagree with him at times. Its called being an adult not a groupie brown noser.
Are you dumb hip hop always been political

You do realize he is being paid to do this right? It's all an act, Em has always said just because he says things in his raps, doesn't mean it's true. 
He is the king of controversy and since Trump has been the GOD of controversy lately, Em is simply being paid to do his job.
"real rap" you mean by blacks? come on...y'all never been scared of being racist before.
Oh NOW you get offended by what he says. Selective outrage... you guys are so funny.  More and more you tell on yourselves.
Vernal K Ford Thank you!
When people think they know what rap is. Please leave this planet, bitch.
Ya cause at the end he says either you hate Trump or gtfoh
Ryan Ko if he wanted to be controversial he should have been a fan of trump and said some positive about him he would have really been controversial
Boo fucking hoo
Ya I don't think there was ever race issues before Trump 💁‍♂️💁‍♂️🤣🤣🤣🤣
True didn't think of that. He sure sound mad.
Jay Jordon I wasn't offended at all.
Megumi Grenovich no Eminem rap has nothing to do with black or white.
We as Americans, white America, mosh... all political rap songs
Did you listen to all the freestylers on the BET Hip Hop Awards tonight? They were almost all talking about the same thing (but I'm sure you know more about real rap than they do)...
Listen to the end. He doesn't give a fuck
Triggered Snowflake, Em has been political since day 1 and tRump is unfit for office.
